text: John Symon Asher "Jack" Bruce (14 May 1943 â€“ 25 October 2014) was a Scottish musician and composer. He was known as a founder member of the British psychedelic rock power trio, Cream, in the late 1960s. Whilst in the band, Bruce played a fretless bass guitar. Bruce died on 25 October 2014 from liver disease in Suffolk, England, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Original Smiles & Grins Jack Bruce Club * Category:1943 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Bass guitarists Category:Deaths from liver disease Category:Manfred Mann members Category:Musicians from East Dunbartonshire Category:Progressive rock singers Category:Scottish rock musicians Category:Cream (band) members
title: Jack Bruce
